alert.note: Alert for Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lucie, southeastern Okeechobee and west central Martin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Four Seasons Estates, or near Treasure Island. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Okeechobee, Four Seasons Estates, Taylor Creek and Whispering Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
